AchievementItems.Title: Systems Analysis and Design
AchievementItems.SubTitle: Educational
AchievementItems.Description: In this University course, a team of students and myself worked together to anaylze, document, and improve the business processes of a non-profit food pantry. During this course I developed various skills in technical writing.
Bullets: Structural (UML Diagrams, E-R Diagrams, Class Diagrams, Story Cards)

AchievementItems.Title: Database Design
AchievementItems.SubTitle: Educational
AchievementItems.Description: In this University course, I learned how to design relational database models and various techniques for normalizing and using them. Concepts such as E-R modeling, locking, SQL syntax, and distrubted databases were emphasized.
